characters.name: Tomeu Scrack
characters.motto: Right now, I'm letting you live. And I'll continue to keep you alive... until you've grown enough to become worth killing.

characters.name: Miki Barcolicus
characters.motto: Electricity doesn't hurt me. When I said it doesn't hurt me, it means I can bare it. None the less, I feel the pain. That's why I'm a bit annoyed...

characters.name: Tonina Constructor
characters.motto: I do not fear death. I fear only that my rage will fade over time.

characters.name: Olivia Riudavets
characters.motto: If you wanna stop this, then stand up! Because I've just got one thing to say to you! Never forget who you want to become!

characters.name: John Kuhn Tagomago
characters.motto: 100 push-ups, 100 sit-ups, 100 squats, and a 10km run EVERY SINGLE DAY!!!

characters.name: Vincent Van der Grosse
characters.motto: When I heard that they were after my buddy...I couldn't do anything!! I didn't do anything!! If I don't act now...forget being a hero, I'm not even a man!

characters.name: Tom Slaughterhouse
characters.motto: I'm sorry to tell you... that for the next three years... U.A. will run you through the wringer. Use your strength to overcome it all. So bring it

characters.name: Jordi Sanostren
characters.motto: I'm not gonna be your worthless punching bag Deku forever... Kacchan. I'm... I'm the Deku who always does his best!
